name: Alchemical Intern
description:
Move - A & D  or Arrows
Jump - Right Mouse or Spacebar
Attack - Left Mouse or Enter

As the Alchemical Intern you are tasked with retrieving and joining together the needed ingredients from the elder alchemists storeroom. 

The cauldron will display one of four ingredients for you to collect. Find the ingredient, bring it back and gain an upgrade to aid in your search for the other ingredients. The upgrades are:

Frog Legs - Double Jump
Mushroom - Increased Movement Speed
Bat Wing - Shorted Attack Cooldown
Eye of Newt - Win the Game!

Made By: John-Michael Veach (concept, programming, music and sound) and Dakota Cummins (concept, art).

"Alchemical Intern" was made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021, June 11-13, 2021.
